00031 template<template<size_t> class ValueType>
00032 class SemanticMemoryCell {
00033 protected:
00034     ValueType<32> address;                      
00035     ValueType<32> data;                         
00036     size_t nbytes;                              
00037     bool clobbered;                             
00038     bool written;                               
00040 public:
00043     template <size_t Len>
00044     SemanticMemoryCell(const ValueType<32> &address, const ValueType<Len> &data, size_t nbytes)
00045         : address(address), data(data), nbytes(nbytes), clobbered(false), written(false) {}
00046 
00049     const ValueType<32>& get_address() const { return address; }
00050     ValueType<32>& get_address() { return address; }
00051     void set_address(const ValueType<32> &addr) { address=addr; }
00056     const ValueType<32>& get_data() const { return data; }
00057     ValueType<32>& get_data() { return data; }
00058     void set_data(const ValueType<32> &d) { data=d; }
00062     size_t get_nbytes() const { return nbytes; }
00063     void set_nbytes(size_t n) { nbytes=n; }
00069     bool is_clobbered() const { return clobbered; }
00070     void set_clobbered(bool b=true) { clobbered=b; }
00071     void clear_clobbered() { clobbered=false; }
00078     bool is_written() const { return written; }
00079     void set_written(bool b=true) { written=b; }
00080     void clear_written() { written=false; }
00087     template<typename PrintHelper>
00088     void print(std::ostream &o, const std::string prefix="", PrintHelper *ph=NULL) const {
00089         o <<prefix <<"address = { ";
00090         address.print(o, ph);
00091         o <<" }\n";
00092 
00093         o <<prefix <<"  value = { ";
00094         data.print(o, ph);
00095         o <<" }\n";
00096 
00097         o <<prefix <<"  flags = { size=" <<nbytes;
00098         if (!written) o <<"; read-only";
00099         if (clobbered) o <<"; clobbered";
00100         o <<" }\n";
00101     }
00102 
00105     friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &o, const SemanticMemoryCell &mc) {
00106         mc.print<SEMANTIC_NO_PRINT_HELPER>(o);
00107         return o;
00108     }
00109

00119 template<
00120     template <template <size_t> class ValueType> class MemoryCell,
00121     template <size_t> class ValueType>
00122 class SemanticStateX86 {
00123 public:
00124     typedef std::vector<MemoryCell<ValueType> > Memory;
00125 
00126     static const size_t n_gprs = 8;             
00127     static const size_t n_segregs = 6;          
00128     static const size_t n_flags = 32;           
00130     ValueType<32> ip;                           
00131     ValueType<32> gpr[n_gprs];                  
00132     ValueType<16> segreg[n_segregs];            
00133     ValueType<1> flag[n_flags];                 
00134     Memory mem;                                 
00137     void clear() {
00138         ip = ValueType<32>();
00139         for (size_t i=0; i<n_gprs; ++i)
00140             gpr[i] = ValueType<32>();
00141         for (size_t i=0; i<n_segregs; ++i)
00142             segreg[i] = ValueType<16>();
00143         for (size_t i=0; i<n_flags; ++i)
00144             flag[i] = ValueType<1>();
00145         mem.clear();
00146     }
00147     
00149     void zero_registers() {
00150         static const uint64_t z = 0;
00151         ip = ValueType<32>(z);
00152         for (size_t i=0; i<n_gprs; ++i)
00153             gpr[i] = ValueType<32>(z);
00154         for (size_t i=0; i<n_segregs; ++i)
00155             segreg[i] = ValueType<16>(z);
00156         for (size_t i=0; i<n_flags; ++i)
00157             flag[i] = ValueType<1>(z);
00158     }
00159 
00161     void clear_memory() {
00162         mem.clear();
00163     }
00164 
00168     template<typename PrintHelper>
00169     void print_registers(std::ostream &o, const std::string prefix="", PrintHelper *ph=NULL) const {
00170         std::ios_base::fmtflags orig_flags = o.flags();
00171         try {
00172             for (size_t i=0; i<n_gprs; ++i) {
00173                 o <<prefix <<std::setw(7) <<std::left <<gprToString((X86GeneralPurposeRegister)i) <<" = { ";
00174                 gpr[i].print(o, ph);
00175                 o <<" }\n";
00176             }
00177             for (size_t i=0; i<n_segregs; ++i) {
00178                 o <<prefix <<std::setw(7) <<std::left <<segregToString((X86SegmentRegister)i) <<" = { ";
00179                 segreg[i].print(o, ph);
00180                 o <<" }\n";
00181             }
00182             for (size_t i=0; i<n_flags; ++i) {
00183                 o <<prefix <<std::setw(7) <<std::left <<flagToString((X86Flag)i) <<" = { ";
00184                 flag[i].print(o, ph);
00185                 o <<" }\n";
00186             }
00187             o <<prefix <<std::setw(7) <<std::left <<"ip" <<" = { ";
00188             ip.print(o, ph);
00189             o <<" }\n";
00190         } catch (...) {
00191             o.flags(orig_flags);
00192             throw;
00193         }
00194         o.flags(orig_flags);
00195     }
00196 
00199     template<typename PrintHelper>
00200     void print_memory(std::ostream &o, const std::string prefix="", PrintHelper *ph=NULL) const {
00201         std::ios_base::fmtflags orig_flags = o.flags();
00202         try {
00203             for (typename Memory::const_iterator mi=mem.begin(); mi!=mem.end(); ++mi)
00204                 (*mi).print(o, prefix, ph);
00205         } catch (...) {
00206             o.flags(orig_flags);
00207             throw;
00208         }
00209         o.flags(orig_flags);
00210     }
00211 
00215     template<typename PrintHelper>
00216     void print(std::ostream &o, const std::string prefix="", PrintHelper *ph=NULL) const {
00217         o <<prefix <<"registers:\n";
00218         print_registers(o, prefix+"    ", ph);
00219         o <<prefix <<"memory:\n";
00220         if (mem.empty()) {
00221             o <<prefix <<"    (empty)\n";
00222         } else {
00223             print_memory(o, prefix+"    ", ph);
00224         }
00225     }
00226 
00229     friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &o, const SemanticStateX86 &state) {
00230         state.print<SEMANTIC_NO_PRINT_HELPER>(o);
00231         return o;
00232     }
00233 };
